str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I reprove, rebuke, discipline, (b) I expose, show to be guilty. Of uncertain affinity; to confute, admonish.
Compound of heros and eidos; heroic; Herod, the name of four Jewish kings.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A tetrarch, ruler over a fourth part of a region. From tessares and archo; the ruler of a fourth part of a country.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
From Herodes; Herodias, a woman of the Heodian family.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
Compound of heros and eidos; heroic; Herod, the name of four Jewish kings.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
